description:
Darnic Prestone Yggdmillennia is http://anidb.net/ch88737 [Lancer of Black]`s Master and the leader of the Yggdmillennia group. He is almost a century old despite looking in his 20s as a result of researching eternal youth. He plundered the Holy Grail from the Third Holy Grail War of Fuyuki.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Darnic Prestone Yggdmillennia
